column5: 1930s 2 BR house; 1 block to Museum Reach of Riverwalk; short walk to Pearl Brewery! Includes 2 Bcycle passes for exploring San Antonio ... riverwalk, Pearl, Farmers' Market, parks, zoo, Missions, restaurants, Market Square, museums, Alamo, shops, etc!
column8: 2 BR HOUSE JUST A SHORT WALK TO RIVER & PEARL
